title: Some topics in homogenization
abstract:
This thesis is mainly concerned with solving a new type of periodic homogenization\ud
problem. A solution of removing the Diophantine hypothesis on the homogenization\ud
problem where the interface sits at an irrational angle to the period is\ud
attempted but is not yet complete. As an aside an oscillator problem is analyzed\ud
using the corrector based approach of homogenization
